text: But after that slight slip of the tongue on Nigel's part she had realised it was important enough for her to have remembered, and it was as though a red mist veiled her usually clear sight and made her think there was an abyss immediately ahead. "Nigel," she had besought him, "you know that evening you took Luke Parson's surgery and there was a woman with a cyst on her ear ... ?"
handwritten_text: But after that slight slip of the tongue on Nigel's part she had realised it was important enough for her to have remembered, and it was as though a red mist veiled her usually clear sight and made her think there was an abyss immediately ahead. "Nigel," she had besought him, "you know that evening you took Luke Parson's surgery and there was a woman with a cyst on her ear ... ?"
